definitions.title: n..[m.]
definitions.body: ] south-country, Negeb, south (cf. Lag:BN 78);—´[[נ]] abs. Ge 20:1 +; cstr. Jos 11:2 +; [[נֶ֫גְבָּה]] Ge 13:14 +;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: specif. the region S. of Judah, boundaries not exactly defined (see cities in it Jos 15:21–Jos 15:32), but c. fr. hills S. of Hebron to Kadesh, ´[[אֶרֶץ הַנּ]] Ge 20:1 (E), Ge 24:62 (J), Nu 13:29 (JE), Ju Jdg 1:15; Jos 15:19; alm. = n.pr. ´[[הַנּ]], [[הַנֶּ֫גְבָּה]], Ge 12:9, Ge 13:1, Nu 13:17, Nu 13:22, Nu 21:1 (all J), De 34:3 (JE), De 1:7, Jos 10:40, Jos 11:16, Jos 12:8 (all D), Nu 33:40, Jos 15:21 (both P), Ju Jdg 1:9, 1Sa 20:41 (but rd. [[הָאַרְגׇּב]], i.e. the mound LXX (a)rgab) Th We Klo Dr Kit Bu HPS), Je 13:19, Je 17:26, Je 32:44, Je 33:13, Zec 7:7, Ob:Ob 20, Ps 126:4 (sim.), Ez Eze 21:3 (= Judah); ´[[נ]] (no art.) Ge 13:3 (J), 1Sa 30:1, Is 30:6 (cf. Di); of particular districts in the Negeb: [[עֲרָד]] ´[[נ]] Ju Jdg 1:16 (cf. GFM), [[יהוּדָה]] ´[[נ]] etc. 1Sa 27:10, 1Sa 27:10, 1Sa 27:10 (cf. Dr), 1Sa 30:14, 1Sa 30:14, 2Sa 24:7, 2Ch 28:18; v. also Zec 14:10; ´[[רָמַת נ]] Jos 19:8, ´[[רָמוֹת נ]] 1Sa 30:27; coll. c. pl. vb. = people of south-land Ob:Ob 19.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: land S. of Babylon Is 21:1 (cf. Di).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = Egypt Da 11:5, Da 11:6, Da 11:9, Da 11:14, Da 11:15, Da 11:25, Da 11:25, Da 11:29, Da 11:40 (v. Meinh Bev Behrm, cf. v:Da 11:43).

hence south (opp. N., E., W.) Ge 13:14, Ge 28:14 (both J), Jos 17:10 (P), 1Ki 7:25 = 2Ch 4:4, 1Ch 9:24, 1Ch 26:15, 1Ch 26:17 (cf. v:1Ch 26:14, v:1Ch 26:16, v:1Ch 26:18), Ez Eze 21:3, Eze 21:9, Da 8:4, Da 8:9, further 1Ki 7:39 Zec 14:4; [[פְּאַת]] [[נֶ֫גְבָּה תֵּימָ֫נׇה]] Ex 26:18, cf. Ex 27:9, Ex 36:23, Ex 38:9, Ex 40:24 (of S. side of tabernacle); ´[[שַׁ֫עַר נ]] Ez Eze 46:9, Eze 46:9; ´[[פְּאַת נ]] south side or border Nu 34:3, Nu 35:5, Jos 18:15 (all P), Ez Eze 47:19, cf v:Eze 47:19, Eze 48:16, Eze 48:28, Eze 48:33; ´[[גְּבוּל נ]] south boundary Nu 34:3, Jos 15:2, Jos 15:4, Jos 18:19 (all P), cf. [[מִנֶּ֫גֶב לְ]] ([[הַגְּבוּל]]) on the south of Nu 34:4, Nu 34:4, Jos 15:3 ([[לְ]] ´[[אֶל־מִנּ]]), v:Jos 15:3, v:Jos 15:7, Jos 18:3 (all P), Ju Jdg 21:19; ´[[מִנּ]] abs. on the south Jos 18:5 (JE), Jos 19:34 (P), 1Sa 14:5, Ez Eze 40:2; ´[[כֶּ֫תֶף הַיְבוּסִי מִנּ]] Jos 15:8, cf. Jos 18:13, Jos 18:16 (all P); [[נֶ֫גְבָּה]] Jos 15:1, Jos 15:2, Jos 18:14, Jos 18:14, Jos 18:19 (all P), 2Ch 4:10, Ez Eze 21:2 (Co; HCT [[נגב]]) Eze 48:10, Eze 48:17; [[נֶ֫גְבָּה לְ]] Jos 17:9 (P).—For [[בִּנְּרוֹת]] ´[[נ]] Jos 11:2 rd.
